title: Behind the Scenes Minis: William Apess
itunes:title: Behind the Scenes Minis: William Apess
description:
Tracy and Holly talk about Tracy’s research process for the William Apess episodes, and how much of his writing she wanted to include in the episode. And that’s because his work is still deeply relevant.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
